class_description:
Thrown if the Java Virtual Machine or a ClassLoader instance
 tries to load in the definition of a class (as part of a normal method call
 or as part of creating a new instance using the new expression)
 and no definition of the class could be found. The searched-for class definition existed when the currently
 executing class was compiled, but the definition can no longer be
 found.

Methods.method_description: Constructs a NoClassDefFoundError with no detail message.

Constructs a NoClassDefFoundError with the specified
 detail message.
